attributes.action: allow actrapd 500 to be got at the local chemist ie Boots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I had my insurlin changed at the bourmouth hospitalto actrapid 500 and they say it can only be got at a hospital I am 74 this year and find it a problem getting there also the costI incure every six weeks why can it not be sent to the chemist for me to pick up I await your reply with thanks MR A.W.Clarke,

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
